item.title: McKinsey Says It Saved 1.5M Hours With AI—but That It Can’t Replace These 3 Job Skills in 2026

item.title: Why Ethics Must Supersede the Longing for Growth at Any Cost
item.description: Leaders need a moral compass to ensure they keep truth as their ultimate north star.

item.title: The Leadership Mistake That Turns Rules Into Resentment
item.description: You can’t build culture by decree. Rules work only when they’re co-authored, clearly explained, and allowed to evolve.

item.title: Ethics: I Had a Bad Year and My Direct Report Had to Do Part of My Job. Should I Apologize?
item.description: In this week’s Ethics column, a leader writes, “I sucked this year.”
